meanings.def: to arrange something in the correct position, or to be in the correct position, in relation to something else, especially in a straight line
examples: Make sure the shelf is aligned with the top of the cupboard.
The top and bottom line of each column on the page should align.
This pillar is roughly aligned with the others.
The house is aligned along an east-west axis.

meanings.def: to change something slightly so that it is in the correct relationship to something else
examples: Domestic prices have been aligned with those in world markets.
